item.title: 葡萄牙认为欧盟和美国将以 "极低 "关税达成贸易协议
item.description: 葡萄牙财政部长若阿金-米兰达-萨门托（Joaquim Miranda Sarmento）表示，他认为欧盟与美国达成的关税可能低于 10%的协议将有助于保持贸易畅通。【原文：Portuguese Finance Minister Joaquim Miranda Sarmento said he sees the European Union and the US reaching an agreement with tariffs potentially below 10% that would help keep trade flowing.】

item.title: 匈牙利零售销售放缓，欧尔班的经济复苏计划受挫
item.description: 匈牙利的零售业在复活节的冲击后放缓幅度超过预期，这凸显了总理维克托-欧尔班为在大选前避免经济衰退所做努力的脆弱性。【原文：Hungarian retail sales slowed more than expected after an Easter bump, underscoring the fragility of Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s efforts to avoid a recession before elections.】

item.title: 西班牙顶级不锈钢制造商希望欧盟在贸易问题上更像特朗普
item.description: 该地区一家顶级不锈钢制造商的负责人表示，欧洲的贸易政策需要更像唐纳德-特朗普的政策，以保护濒临崩溃的钢铁行业免受中国进口产品的冲击。【原文：Europe’s approach to trade will need to be more like Donald Trump’s to protect an ailing steel industry from a flood of Chinese imports, according to the head of one of the region’s top stainless steel makers.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行押注中东，提升两位中东地区联席首席执行官
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）提升了两位高级领导人的职位，以监督其在中东地区不断增长的业务，此举表明中东地区在全球金融舞台和银行内部的影响力都在不断增长。【原文：Barclays Plc elevated a pair of senior leaders to oversee its growing business in the Middle East in a move that shows the region’s growing clout both on the global financial stage and within the bank.】

item.title: 中国人民银行持续购买黄金，储备连续第八个月增长
item.description: 由于贵金属价格接近历史最高水平，中国在 6 月份连续第八个月增加了官方黄金储备。【原文：China added to its official gold reserves for an eighth straight month in June, as prices of the precious metal traded near a record high.】

item.title: 风能骤降，化石燃料将填补欧洲电力缺口
item.description: 由于今年夏天风力发电量将下滑，电价和排放都将上升，因此欧洲的煤炭和天然气发电厂可能会伸出援手。【原文：Europe’s fleet of coal and gas plants could come to the rescue as wind power generation is set to slump this summer, driving up both electricity prices and emissions.】

item.title: 瑞典通胀加速押注八月降息
item.description: 瑞典上个月的通胀率升幅超过预期，这打破了瑞典央行将在 8 月份降息以支持陷入困境的经济的预期。【原文：Sweden’s inflation rate accelerated more than expected last month, knocking expectations that the central bank will cut interest rates in August to support the struggling economy.】

item.title: 美国关税期限临近，欧洲天然气价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商关注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普迅速临近的关税最后期限以及征税将对全球经济活动产生的影响，欧洲天然气价格趋于稳定。【原文：European natural gas prices steadied as traders eyed US President Donald Trump’s fast-approaching tariff deadline and the impact levies will have on global economic activity.】

item.title: 以色列将超越谢克尔涨势，维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列央行将连续第 12 次维持利率不变，决策者们正等待着看谢克尔最近的反弹是否有助于抑制通胀并为降息铺平道路。【原文：Israel’s central bank is set to hold interest rates for a 12th consecutive time, with policymakers waiting to see if the shekel’s recent rally helps tame inflation and paves the way for a cut.】

item.title: 德国工业反弹，企业先行应对更高的关税
item.description: 德国 5 月份的工业生产意外增长，表明企业在对美国出口可能征收更高的关税之前加紧生产。【原文：German industrial production unexpectedly rose in May, suggesting companies rushed production before potentially much higher tariffs on exports to the US.】

item.title: 壳牌第二季度交易表现不佳
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）表示，其第二季度天然气和石油交易业绩将大大低于前三个月，这表明了大型能源公司是如何应对近期市场波动的。【原文：Shell Plc said its second-quarter trading results in both gas and oil will be significantly lower than the previous three months, in an indication of how major energy companies have navigated recent market volatility.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯（Halifax）称，英国房价因税收增加而持平
item.description: 据英国最大的贷款机构之一称，英国房价连续第二个月未实现增长，原因是减税政策到期后，住房市场难以获得牵引力，而且进入市场的卖家急剧增加。【原文：UK house prices failed to grow for a second straight month, as the housing market struggles to gain traction after a tax break expired and a sharp increase in sellers coming to market, according to one of the country’s biggest lenders.】

印尼承诺购买更多美国小麦以争取贸易协议
item.description: 印尼是世界第二大小麦买家，计划从美国购买更多小麦，因为印尼希望在即将到来的关税截止日期前达成贸易协议。【原文：Indonesia, the world’s second-biggest wheat buyer, plans to purchase more wheat from the US as it seeks to secure a trade deal ahead of the looming tariff deadline.】

item.title: 凯捷拟斥资 33 亿美元收购 IT 公司 WNS 以促进人工智能发展
item.description: 法国凯捷公司（Capgemini SE）计划以 33 亿美元的价格收购 IT 外包公司 WNS 控股有限公司（WNS Holdings Ltd. ），从而击败竞争对手，达成一项旨在扩大其人工智能业务的交易。【原文：France’s Capgemini SE plans to acquire IT outsourcing firm WNS Holdings Ltd. for $3.3 billion, beating rival suitors to a deal aimed at expanding its AI operations.】

item.title: 据说苹果供应商透镜技术公司将以 6.07 亿美元的最高价在香港上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，苹果公司供应商朗思科技公司在香港上市的定价为市场定价的最高价，现已筹集到 48 亿港元（6.07 亿美元）。【原文：Apple Inc. supplier Lens Technology Co. has raised HK$4.8 billion ($607 million) after pricing its Hong Kong listing at the top of the marketed range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 顶级预测师称泰铢飙升面临动荡风险
item.description: 据泰铢的顶级预测机构称，由于政治动荡预计将对经济造成压力，泰铢四个月来的涨势可能会出现动摇。【原文：The Thai baht’s four-month rally is likely to falter as political turmoil is expected to weigh on the economy, according to the currency’s top forecaster.】

item.title: 银行业、烈酒和 007 的车轮：当前值得关注的 10 家公司
item.description: 彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的分析师从数千家上市公司中筛选出少数几家公司，重点推荐给投资者。【原文：Analysts at Bloomberg Intelligence have sifted through thousands of publicly traded companies to highlight a select few for investors.】

item.description:

item.title: 受关税和消费者情绪影响，LG 电子业绩不及预期
item.description: LG 电子公司（LG Electronics Inc.股价下跌达 3.9%。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. reported preliminary profit that missed estimates, with the consumer electronics maker blaming US tariffs intensifying competition and costs. Shares fell as much as 3.9%.】

item.title: 日产汽车将出售 1,500 亿日元可转换债券以实现复苏
item.description: 日产汽车公司计划出售 1,500 亿日元（10.4 亿美元）的可转换债券，以帮助新任首席执行官伊万-埃斯皮诺萨（Ivan Espinosa）为这家濒临破产的汽车制造商的扭亏为盈提供资金。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. plans to sell ¥150 billion ($1.04 billion) of convertible bonds to help fund new chief executive officer Ivan Espinosa’s turnaround of the ailing automaker.】

item.title: 交易员下一轮做空美元的赌注不局限于欧元
item.description: 在做空美元时，交易员们正在寻找欧元的替代品，因为他们希望利用对美国货币进一步走软的预期。【原文：Traders are seeking alternatives to the euro when shorting the dollar as they look to capitalize on expectations for further weakness in the US currency.】

item.title: 经济低迷，降息在即，奇异果涨势或将减弱
item.description: 由于新西兰央行继续降息，当地经济依然低迷，新西兰元的涨势可能会在下半年消退。【原文：The New Zealand dollar’s rally may fade in the second half of the year, as the central bank continues to cut interest rates and the local economy remains sluggish.】

item.title: 德国 400 亿美元养老金委托中国股票基金管理
item.description: 一家德国养老基金已聘请一家中国公司在香港的分支机构帮助其投资本地股票，这在对投资中国股票持谨慎态度的全球投资机构中实属罕见。【原文：A German pension fund has tapped a Chinese firm’s Hong Kong arm to help it invest in local stocks, in a rare move among global allocators that have been cautious about gaining exposure to the nation’s equities.】

item.title: 部长表示泰国预算法案和支出将按计划进行
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，泰国将继续推进刺激经济的计划，并按计划通过明年的预算，从而缓解人们对当前政治危机可能破坏经济政策的担忧。【原文：Thailand will push ahead with plans to stimulate the economy and pass the budget for next year as planned, Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira said, easing concerns that an ongoing political crisis could derail economic policy.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对 "反美 "金砖国家结盟征收 10%关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将对任何与 "金砖国家的反美政策 "保持一致的国家额外征收 10%的关税，这给全球贸易注入了更多不确定性，因为美国仍在与许多贸易伙伴谈判征税事宜。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would put an additional 10% tariff on any country aligning themselves with “the Anti-American policies of BRICS,” injecting further uncertainty into global trade as the US continues to negotiate levies with many trading partners.】
